tasks.title: Run walk-forward validation for momentum
tasks.description: Run 5-window walk-forward validation for momentum. Use 70/30 train/test split per window. Calculate OOS decay (reject if >50%). Save results with in-sample and out-of-sample metrics to output/backtests/2026-01-18/.

tasks.title: Combine ATR with MACD for NQ
tasks.description: Test combining ATR with MACD as entry filter on NQ. Document hypothesis first. Run backtest with costs. Save results showing improvement vs single indicator to output/backtests/2026-01-18/.

tasks.title: Combine Volume Profile with ATR for RTY
tasks.description: Test combining Volume Profile with ATR as entry filter on RTY. Document hypothesis first. Run backtest with costs. Save results showing improvement vs single indicator to output/backtests/2026-01-18/.

tasks.title: Backtest counter-trend on NQ
tasks.description: Backtest counter-trend strategy on NQ with: $2.50/side commission, 0.5 tick slippage, minimum 100 trades. Calculate Sharpe, max DD, win rate. Auto-reject if Sharpe>3.0 or win rate>80%. Save JSON results to output/backtests/2026-01-18/.
